response.explain: The error message indicates that the stove was not turned on before attempting to cook the garlic clove. The stove needs to be turned on before any cooking can take place.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Prepare the garlic clove
(4) Turn on the stove
(5) Move the robot to the stove
(6) Cook the garlic clove
(7) Take out the butter
(8) Place the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Turn on the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_igwqpj_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
